name: sttl
description: Source to destination time to live

name: dttl
description: Destination to source time to live

name: smeansz
description: Mean of the packet size transmitted by the source

name: dmeansz
description: Mean of the packet size transmitted by the destination

name: res_bdy_len
description: Actual uncompressed content size of the data transferred

name: is_sm_ips_ports
description: Connection has same src/dst IP and ports

name: ct_state_ttl
description: No. of connections with same state and ttl

name: ct_flw_http_mthd
description: No. of flows with same http method

name: ct_ftp_cmd
description: No. of flows with same FTP command

name: ct_srv_src
description: No. of connections with same service and source

name: ct_srv_dst
description: No. of connections with same service and destination

name: ct_dst_ltm
description: No. of connections with same destination and last time

name: ct_src_ltm
description: No. of connections with same source and last time

name: ct_src_dport_ltm
description: No. of connections with same source and destination port in last time

name: ct_dst_sport_ltm
description: No of connections with same destination and source port in last time

name: ct_dst_src_ltm
description: No of connections with same destination and source in last time
